DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the efficacy and safety of incobotulinumtoxinA (Xeomin) in comparison to placebo in the treatment of moderate to severe lateral periorbital wrinkles at maximum smile and to compare two different application schemes of Xeomin. Each subject will be treated on the right and left eye area, using the same dose but different application schemes (i.e. 3 or 4 injection sites).
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of NT 201 in the Treatment of Lateral Periorbital Wrinkles
DOC.criteria: Main Moderate (grade 2) to severe (grade 3) symmetrical lateral periorbital wrinkles assessed by the investigator according to the 4point scale at maximum smile Main Significant facial asymmetry
